QuestData.Title: Spread Your Lunarwings and Fly
QuestData.Description: These poor faerie dragons are being tortured!$B$BWhat's worse, when the thistleleaf become bored they ensnare their victims to continue their torment later.$b$bThis behavior is simply unacceptable.$B$BPlease free any trapped Lunarwings you can find.
QuestData.LogDescription: Save 8 Trapped Lunarwings in the Lunarwing Shallows.
QuestData.CompletionText: Please help the poor Lunarwings. They are such gentle creatures.
QuestData.RewardText: On behalf of the Lunarwings, thank you.
